1.name: Rapid Heat
1.desc: When Soldier 11 becomes the active character in combat, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.

flavor.0: Long-term high-intensity combat training allows Soldier 11 to complete mastery of her regulatory systems.
flavor.1: She will always strive to ensure that she's in the best shape for each and every battle.

2.name: Scorching Convergence
2.desc: When triggering <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.

flavor.0: "She may look cold and hard, like a big ice cube... But actually, she's scalding hot inside, like a blazing fire."
flavor.1: â€” From an anonymous soldier of the Obsidian Division

3.name: Elite Soldier
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Soldier 11 always expects the most from herself, no matter if it's in training or physical combat. That is how she maintains her combat prowess.

4.name: Indulgent Blaze

desc.0: If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</ct> is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
desc.1: If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</ct> is triggered during the 4th hit of her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.

4.flavor: She envies fire. And these smoldering flames will always help her.

5.name: Perfect Soldier
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: The road from elite to exemplar is long and difficult, but Soldier 11 grits her teeth and perseveres, as if there's something pushing her towards the goal of becoming a perfect soldier...

6.name: Scorching Flow

desc.0: When Soldier 11 uses her <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
desc.1: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</ct> is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's <ct color=#FF5521>Fire RES</ct>.

6.flavor: The flames of the sword distorted the air with their heat. Her movements grew ever more impassioned, as if that heat seeped into her spirit with every breath, igniting her thoughts.
